Hymn.Arabic: تَقَوَّ وَلْيَتَشَدَّدُ قَلْبُكَ ، وَانْتَظَرِ الرَّبَّ. وَأَنَا أُؤمِنُ أَنِّي أُعَايِنُ خَيْرَاتِ الرَّبِّ ، فِي أَرْضِ الْأَحْيَاءِ هللويا.
Hymn.English: Wait on the Lord; be of good courage, And He shall strengthen your heart; Wait, I say, on the Lord! I had believed that I would see the goodness of the Lord in the land of the living.
